import React from "react"; import { Animated } from "react-animated-css"; import Toolbar from "@material-ui/core/Toolbar"; import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; import { withStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import Card from "@material-ui/core/Card"; import CardActionArea from "@material-ui/core/CardActionArea"; import CardContent from "@material-ui/core/CardContent"; import CardMedia from "@material-ui/core/CardMedia"; import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography"; import "./App.css"; const styles = { body: { display: "grid", justifyItems: "center", position: "relative", bottom: 100, gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(auto-fit, minmax(320px, 1fr))" }, card: { placeSelf: "center", width: "21em", height: "auto", marginBottom: 50 }, media: { objectFit: "cover" }, text: { fontFamily: "Quicksand", fontWeight: "bold", color: "white" }, failure: { color: "white" }, action: { backgroundColor: "#1f2127" } }; function App(props) { const { classes } = props; return (

Universa Localis

The whole universe on your screen

APOD Get the astronomy picture of the day, everyday! Mars Rover Photos Get the images taken by the rovers on Mars! NASA IVL Search media on NASA's Image and Video Library! NASA Techport Discover the technologies NASA is currently working on! SpaceX Missions View all the details about SpaceX missions! The Sky Map Search for the stars and view them on a map!
); } export default withStyles(styles)(App);
